values: A chore is an unpleasant job that must be done.
It’s Nikki’s chore to do the dishes every Tuesday and Wednesday night.
n. 家庭杂务；日常的零星事务；讨厌的或累人的工作
n. 家庭杂务，杂活；累活，苦差事
